home.addUser.title: Add a user!
home.addUser.loggedIn: Because you're logged in, you've already been added! You'll be processed on the next loop.
home.addUser.loggedOut: To add yourself to Osekai Rankings, simply log in with your osu! account. Click the button in the top right corner to do so.
home.addUser.addAnotherUser.title: Add another user
home.addUser.addAnotherUser.loggedOut: Please log in to add a user.
